scripts.watch: parcel watch -t browser --cache-dir app/.cache -d app/debug_dist app/frontend/*.html app/frontend/*.tsx --public-url app/debug_dist
scripts.clean-backend: rm -rf app/backend/target && docker-compose stop && docker-compose rm
scripts.pull-all: git pull upstream master && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.serve-backend: docker-compose up -d && cd app/backend && systemfd --no-pid -s http::5000 -- cargo watch -x run
scripts.serve-frontend: parcel serve -t browser --cache-dir app/.cache -d app/debug_dist app/frontend/*.html
scripts.build-frontend: parcel build -d app/dist --no-cache --detailed-report -t browser app/frontend/*.html --public-url app/dist
